wikipedia_page.main: Mike Galloway (born 30 May 1965) is a football player and coach. Galloway played for Berwick Rangers, Mansfield Town, Halifax Town, Heart of Midlothian, Celtic and Leicester City as a midfielder. Born in Oswestry, England, Galloway represented Scotland once in an international match.

link_mentions.page: List of Celtic F.C. international footballers

response: Michael or Mike Galloway may refer to:
*Mike Galloway (Shortland Street character), character from the New Zealand soap Shortland Street, played by Oliver Driver
